title: 正版进服务器怎么出现这个
author: cspcsp
txt_content: 正版进服务器怎么出现这个you do not have fml installed,you cannot connect to this server他说我没有FML安装

replies.txt_content: 你进的是的有MOD的服务器，要安装Forge ModLoader

replies.author: cspcsp
replies.txt_content:
